title: Failure to import from $(VSToolsPath) in 17.5
body:
Errors like

```
MSB4226 The imported project "$(VSToolsPath)\TeamTest\Microsoft.TestTools.targets" was not found. Also, tried to find "$(VSToolsPath)\TeamTest\Microsoft.TestTools.targets" in the fallback search path(s) for $(VSToolsPath) - "C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v17.0" . Confirm that the path in the <Import> declaration is correct, and that the file exists on disk in one of the search paths.
```

```
The imported project "$(VSToolsPath)\VSSDK\Microsoft.VsSDK.targets" was not found. Also, tried to find "$(VSToolsPath)\VSSDK\Microsoft.VsSDK.targets" in the fallback search path(s) for $(VSToolsPath) - "C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v17.0" . These search paths are defined in "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Preview\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe.Config". Confirm that the path in the <Import> declaration is correct, and that the file exists on disk in one of the search paths.
```
